title: Create calculator module with basic operations
body:
## Problem Description
We need a new calculator module to handle basic mathematical operations.

## Background
The application needs to perform calculations and we want to organize this functionality in a dedicated module.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create `src/calculator.py` module
- [ ] Implement `add(a, b)` function that returns sum of two numbers
- [ ] Implement `subtract(a, b)` function that returns difference
- [ ] Implement `multiply(a, b)` function that returns product
- [ ] Implement `divide(a, b)` function with zero division handling
- [ ] Create comprehensive tests in `tests/test_calculator.py`
- [ ] Ensure 100% test coverage for the module
